Title: Prohibits the parking of a vehicle greater than sixty inches in height within fifteen feet of an intersection
Summary: Prohibits the parking of a vehicle greater than sixty inches in height within fifteen feet of an intersection.
LawCode: Amd ยง1202, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to prohibiting the parking of a vehicle greater than sixty inches in height within fifteen feet of an intersection
